Html: It would be nice to be able to lock slots for the optimizer. That is, what I'm currently wearing in these slots should not be touched/changed/altered. However, they should be included in all calculations.
I support this idea. A small lock icon next to every slot or something would make things a lot easier than "de-selecting" every item but the one you're wearing ;)
It's not even possible to deselect every item but the one you're wearing since Rawr can still re-gem the item then.
